ComicInfo.Summary: The Zealous Advocate: Jennifer consults Matt Murdock about her Doom problem, then travels to Latveria to convince the Doctor to allow his son Kristoff more freedom. Later, she takes on a new case involving a past lawsuit against her and several others that she doesn't remember at all.
